summary: TensorFlow implementation of the LayoutLM model fine‑tuned for sequence classification tasks, providing a layout‑aware transformer that processes text together with positional and visual information to predict class labels for input sequences.
business_intent: Enable developers to apply a pretrained, layout‑aware language model to classify document text segments, supporting use cases such as form field identification, document type detection, and other NLP tasks that require understanding of text layout.
